description: REAR GARDENT1 Holly (Ilex aquifolium) - 20% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 1-1.5m. Reduce on client side a bit harder, to limit spread over and towards building. Final height 7m and final spread 4m. 	T2 Yew (Taxus baccata) - 25% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2m to tidy and contain and retain furnishing growth.Final height 10m and final spread 8m. 	G3 Cherry Laurel (Prunus laurocerasus) Reduce height by around 2-3m. Reduce spread into clients garden back to in line with path edge closest to boundary. Reduce / thin on Masonic Hospital side by 20% to allow more light through to garden. Final height 7m and final spread 5m North / South & 10m East / West (to maintain screening). 	T4 Honey locust (Gleditsia triacanthos) - Crown clean through removal of dead, weak and suppressed branches. Remove small diameter branch hanging low over garden. Reduce upper stem coming over garden by 2-3m, cutting to suitable growth points. Final height unchanged at 12m and final spread 8m. 	T5 Yew (Taxus baccata) - Remove dead branches. Reduce South side of crown by 1-1.5m to increase light to garden.T6 Chusan palm (Trachycarpus fortunei) - Remove dead / dying fronds and flower / seed heads. Remove low, downward hanging fronds to leave only upright fronds at top of stem. Final height unchanged at 8m and final spread 2m. 	T7 Palm Cordyline (Cordyline australis) -Fell as tree has out grown location. FRONT GARDENT8 Palm Cordyline (Cordyline australis) - Remove 2 stems that splay out from group, one over neighbours at No.21, and one towards adjacent palm. G9 Chusan palm (Trachycarpus fortunei) - 2 x trees - remove dead / dying fronds and flower / seed heads. Remove low, downward hanging fronds to leave only upright fronds at top of stem. Final height unchanged at 8m and final spread 2m. 	(T10	Austrian Pine (Pinus nigra) Using a MEWP - 25% Crown Reduction  (See 2025/01669/TPO)
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
